
FRAME&CODE â€” MINI BRAND KIT
===========================

Palette
-------
- Turquoise: #00B8C8
- Charcoal:  #0E1116
- Off-White: #F7F8FA
- Accent:    #FFC300

Usage
-----
- Use *logo_horizontal_dark.svg* on light backgrounds.
- Use *logo_horizontal_light.svg* on dark backgrounds.
- *icon_mark.svg* fits favicons, app icons, and social avatars.
- *logo_stacked_*.svg* for square spaces (profile, stickers, signage).

Typography (suggested)
----------------------
- Arabic: Cairo, IBM Plex Sans Arabic
- Latin: Inter, Poppins, Sora
(Wordmarks use system fallbacks; for final print, outline text in your vector app.)

Notes
-----
- All SVGs are fully vector and transparent-background.
- Colors are WCAG-friendly with good contrast on typical UIs.
- You can edit text/tagline inside the SVG <text> elements if needed.
